Comment: White has adopted a King's Indian Attack system,which he has enjoyed much success with.I have tried different systems against this,and now prefer my fav. Closed Sicilian set-up against it.

It depends on the player and mood,as to which move is used here,either 8...d6 or 8...d5.I prefer ...d6 as this protects the c5 pawn and keeps an eye on e5,while continuing with your plan of pushing the b pawn.

Obviously not 17.Nxb3,as 17...dc would fork Knight and Queen.
